name: A Game of Wits and Pistols
name_original: A Game of Wits and Pistols
description:
After surviving a mutiny and a savage storm that wrecked his ship, a young pirate must find a way to survive on a deserted island.

I recommend using the icon in the lower right-hand part of the play screen to switch to full screen mode.

* * *

''A Game of Wits and Pistols''
a short story game
by John Vanderhoef

Cover image: Marooned (close up).jpg:

Music by GWriterStudio

Ocean Village - GWriterStudio
Tropical Jungle - GWriterStudio
Peat Swamp - GWriterStudio

This story game was completed as part of a tutorial series to illustrate the basic functions of Twine for an interactive narrative course.
